text: The Blade Lite 400 is an attractive, sleek retractable banner stand with chrome finish endcaps and a streamlined base design. This highly portable stand is perfect for many environments and public spaces such as trade shows and events, complementing all display types and sizes. Graphic width measures 15.75", with a graphic height of 69.37".
title: Blade Lite 400 Retractable Banner Stand

text: Designed to stand the test of time, the Rollup is a single-sided, sleek and stylish retractable banner stand display that is convenient and easy to use. Rollup features a black heavy-duty base, 3-piece bungee pole, graphic and padded carry bag.
title: Rollup Retractable Banner Stand

text: The approximately 2ft by 7ft size of the Blade Lite 600 provides the versatility to use in a variety of environments. High quality custom graphics easily roll up and collapse into the base, making for quick and easy setup and storage. The graphic measures 23.5"W, with a variable graphic height of 69"-83.25"H.
title: Blade Lite 600 Retractable Banner Stand
